languages.text: Непосредственная опасность была устранена. Сохраняется угроза повторного эпизода, связанного с неконтролируемым псайкером.

traits.locale_text: Непосредственная опасность была устранена. Сохраняется угроза повторного эпизода, связанного с неконтролируемым псайкером. Рекомендовано вмешательство Лорд-капитана.

languages.text: The direct threat has been eliminated, but the threat of a repeat occurrence remains as long as the psyker cannot control her abilities.
languages.original_text: Непосредственная опасность была устранена. Сохраняется угроза повторного эпизода, связанного с неконтролируемым псайкером.

traits.locale_text: The direct threat has been eliminated, but the threat of a repeat occurrence remains as long as the psyker cannot control her abilities.
The direct threat has been eliminated, but the threat of a repeat occurrence remains as long as the psyker cannot control her abilities.
The direct threat has been eliminated, but the threat of a repeat occurrence remains as long as the psyker cannot control her abilities.
The direct threat has been eliminated, but the threat of a repeat occurrence remains as long as the psyker cannot control her abilities.

languages.text: 直接威胁已消除，但只要灵能者伊迪拉无法控制自己的能力，这个威胁就可能再次发生。
languages.original_text: The direct threat has been eliminated, but the threat of a repeat occurrence remains as long as the psyker cannot control her abilities.

traits.locale_text: 直接威胁已消除，但只要灵能者伊迪拉无法控制自己的能力，这个威胁就可能再次发生。

languages.text: 直接の脅威は排除されたが、異能者がその能力をコントロールできない限り再発の脅威は残る。
languages.original_text: The direct threat has been eliminated, but the threat of a repeat occurrence remains as long as the psyker cannot control her abilities.

traits.locale_text: 直接の脅威は排除されたが、異能者がその能力をコントロールできない限り再発の脅威は残る。

languages.text: La amenaza directa ha sido neutralizada, pero podrá repetirse la situación mientras la psíquica no controle sus habilidades.
languages.original_text: The direct threat has been eliminated, but the threat of a repeat occurrence remains as long as the psyker cannot control her abilities.

traits.locale_text: La amenaza directa ha sido neutralizada, pero podrá repetirse la situación mientras la psíquica no controle sus habilidades.

languages.text: Die direkte Bedrohung wurde beseitigt, aber die Gefahr eines neuerlichen Auftretens bleibt bestehen, solange die Psionikerin ihre Fähigkeiten nicht kontrollieren kann.
languages.original_text: The direct threat has been eliminated, but the threat of a repeat occurrence remains as long as the psyker cannot control her abilities.

traits.locale_text: Die direkte Bedrohung wurde beseitigt, aber die Gefahr eines neuerlichen Auftretens bleibt bestehen, solange die Psionikerin ihre Fähigkeiten nicht kontrollieren kann.

languages.text: La menace directe a été éliminée, mais la possibilité d'une récidive n'est pas à exclure tant que la psyker ne contrôle pas ses capacités.
languages.original_text: The direct threat has been eliminated, but the threat of a repeat occurrence remains as long as the psyker cannot control her abilities.

traits.locale_text: La menace directe a été éliminée, mais la possibilité d'une récidive n'est pas à exclure tant que la psyker ne contrôle pas ses capacités.

languages.text: Tehlike şimdilik ortadan kaldırılmış olsa da ruhsezer kabiliyetlerini kontrol edemediği sürece aynı şeyler tekrar yaşanabilir.
languages.original_text: The direct threat has been eliminated, but the threat of a repeat occurrence remains as long as the psyker cannot control her abilities.
